abilities.name: Ancient Spear
abilities.description: Throw out a spear that pulls Sonya to the first enemy hit, dealing 173 damage and briefly stunning them. If this hits an enemy, generate 40 Fury.

abilities.name: Seismic Slam
abilities.description: Deals 176 damage to the target enemy, and 44 to enemies behind the target.

abilities.name: Whirlwind
abilities.description: Deals 441 damage to nearby enemies over 3 seconds, and heals for 25% of damage dealt. Healing tripled versus Heroes.

heroics.name: Leap
heroics.description: Leap into the air, dealing 135 damage to nearby enemies, and stunning them for 1.25 seconds.

heroics.name: Wrath of the Berserker
heroics.description: Increase damage dealt by 40%. Reduce the duration of stuns, slows, and roots against Sonya by 50%. Lasts 15 seconds, and extends by 1 second for every 10 Fury gained.
